pages.text: With the technology exchange settled, we loaded up for the trip home. Mr. Michaels got to work analyzing and researching the tablet, while the rest of the crew and I got some much needed R & R. $(br2)I awoke to sirens and alarms. The ship was on a crash course for an unknown celestial body. I reached the auto-navs console at the same time as Mr. Michaels.

$(br)He ascertained that the auto-navs must have mal-functioned and the system plotted a course to an unknown region in space. Unknown to us that is. Someone knows its out there. I alerted Sargeant to check the ship, top to bottom, that we may have a stow-away. $(br2)I ordered the ship to halt its course and the scientists to stay in their cabins.
